scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn export && git checkout -- docs/CNAME && git checkout -- docs/.nojekyll && git add docs && git commit -m "chore: redeploy site" && git push origin master
scripts.postexport: shx mv docs/whitepaper.pdf docs/whitepaper.js && shx mkdir docs/whitepaper.pdf && shx mv docs/whitepaper.js docs/whitepaper.pdf/index.js
